v8:item.v8:content: The payment currency exchange rate multiplier.
The department that issued the "account sales from consignee" document.
The manager who issued the "account sales from consignee" document.
The consignee witholds the commision from the amount transferred to the consignor.
The user who created the "account sales from consignee" document.
Payment method: electronic, cash or not defined
The goods transferred to the consignee.
The batch that contains the product.
The quantity of goods sold by the consignee.
The total amount that is calculated automatically.
The VAT rate applied to the consignee's purchase amount.
The commission amount calculated based on the terms of the consignee's contract and the parameters on the "Additional information" tab.
The VAT rate applied to the commission amount.
The sales order issued for the transfer of goods to the consignee.
A unique ID for mapping a line of "Inventory" tabular section to a line of "Customers" tabular section. It is generated automatically and cannot be edited.
A unique ID for mapping a line of "Inventory" tabular section to a line of "SerialNumbers" tabular section. It is generated automatically and cannot be edited.
A unique ID for mapping a line of "Inventory" tabular section to a line of "Customers" tabular section. It is generated automatically and cannot be edited.
Select advances issued to the advance holder.
A unique ID for mapping a line of "Inventory" tabular section to a line of "SerialNumbers" tabular section. It is generated automatically and cannot be edited.
Date before which the order payment percent is due.
